io.sarl.lang.core

Class Agent

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sarl.lang.core.Agent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Identifiable

    public class Agent
extends Object
implements Identifiable
    The definition of the notion of Agent in SARL. An agent is an autonomous entity having some intrinsic skills to realize the capacities it exhibits. An agent defines a context.
    Version:
    $FullVersion$
    Author:
    $Author: srodriguez$

      Creates a new agent by parent parentID.

        agentID - - the identifier of the agent, or null for computing it randomly.

      • getSkill

        protected <S extends Capacity> S getSkill(Class<S> capacity)
        Replies with the skill associated to the Capacity capacity. The return may be null if not capacity was set.
        Type Parameters:
        S - - the type of the capacity.
        Parameters:
        capacity - - the capacity to retreive.
        Returns:
        the skill.

      • hasSkill

        protected boolean hasSkill(Class<? extends Capacity> capacity)
        Checks if this agent has a Skill that implements the Capacity capacity.
        Parameters:
        capacity - - capacity to check
        Returns:
        true if it has a skill associate to this capacity, false otherwise

      • isMe

        protected boolean isMe(Address address)
        Replies if the given address is one of the addresses of this agent. The test is done on the identifier replied by Address.getUUID().
        Parameters:
        address - - the address to test.
        Returns:
        true if the given address is one of this agent, otherwise false.

      • isMe

        protected boolean isMe(UUID id)
        Replies if the given identifier corresponds to the identifier of this agent.

        This function is equivalent to:

        
 id.equals( agent.getID() )
        Parameters:
        id - - the identifier to test.
        Returns:
        true if the given identifier is the one of this agent, otherwise false.

      • isFromMe

        protected boolean isFromMe(Event event)
        Replies if the given event was emitted by this agent.
        Parameters:
        event - - the event to test.
        Returns:
        true if the given event was emitted by this agent; otherwise false.
